backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of frontend React components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: TailwindCSS setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading fonts and mounting the React app at the #root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with all app routes and renders the router provider.
frontend/src/components/AddChapterDialog: Dialog component allowing users to create a new chapter with name, lecture count, and duration.
frontend/src/components/AllChaptersBySub: Lists all chapters grouped by subject with completion indicators and badges.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that displays error details and provides reset and reload controls.
frontend/src/components/BottomNavigation: Renders a bottom navigation bar with home, subjects, calendar, tests, and customization buttons, using route state to highlight the active item.
frontend/src/components/ChapterCard.tsx: Displays a chapter card with status, target hours, and work session controls, including adding, editing, and deleting time entries.
frontend/src/components/ChapterDetailPan: Shows a detailed chapter panel with editable fields, status updates, and calculated target hours and finish dates.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the app layout with header, outlet, bottom navigation, and customization panel within a provider.
frontend/src/components/MonthGridCalenda: Generates a month-view calendar grid with date selection, navigation, and optional day indicators.
frontend/src/components/OverallPerforman: Aggregates test scores into a trend chart, computes trend direction via regression, and renders a performance line graph.
A sidebar component that lists resources for a subject and allows adding or deleting items using useResources.
frontend/src/components/SubjectCompletio: Displays subject completion stats with a progress bar and chapter grid, including animations for newly completed chapters.
frontend/src/components/TasksDrawer.tsx: A slide-out menu providing navigation and a subject-specific task manager with add, toggle, and delete functionality.
frontend/src/components/TestScoreChart.t: Renders a line or bar chart of test scores using SVG scaling logic with support for multiple attempts.
frontend/src/components/TodoList.tsx: Shows a subject-specific todo list with add, toggle, and delete actions powered by useTodos.
frontend/src/customization/applyDarkMode: Applies dark mode classes based on user override settings or defaults to dark mode.
frontend/src/customization/Customization: A simple icon button that triggers opening the customization panel.
A settings panel allowing users to adjust study preferences like target hours, speed factor, and sleep window.
Provides customization settings context with update and reset abilities, applying dark mode overrides.
frontend/src/customization/integration.t: Provides utility functions for notification checks, sleep window logic, UI density, and calculating study hours and finish dates based on customization settings.
frontend/src/customization/settingsModel: Defines the customization settings schema, default values, and a validator that clamps and normalizes incoming settings.
frontend/src/customization/useCustomizat: Implements a hook for loading, saving, applying, and deleting user-defined settings presets with localStorage persistence.
Provides a hook for loading, updating, and resetting customization settings with versioned localStorage storage.
frontend/src/data/chapters.ts: Defines chapter data structures and initializes a large predefined chapter list with metadata such as lectures, duration, and subject.
frontend/src/data/subjects.ts: Provides subject definitions plus legacy route and name mappings for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCalendarEntries.ts: Manages per‑date calendar notes with CRUD helpers and versioned localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useChapterData.ts: Loads, migrates, updates, and persists chapter data with cross‑tab synchronization via a custom event.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentlyWorkingCh: Tracks active chapter work sessions with timing, pause/resume logic, migration handling, and persistent state storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardNote.ts: Manages a dashboard note string with versioned localStorage persistence and exposes note state setters.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardTitle.ts: Stores and retrieves a dashboard title from localStorage with versioning and default fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a context-based Internet Identity auth client with login, logout, status tracking, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotes.ts: Handles CRUD operations for notes and persists them in versioned localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook exposing actor and fetching status for future backend queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useResources.ts: Manages subject-specific resources with migration from legacy formats and synced localStorage storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyLog.ts: Tracks study log entries, persists them, and triggers sleep-window notifications on logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubjects.ts: Manages subject list with add and lookup helpers, persisting data in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useTests.ts: Maintains tests with scores, chart settings, and CRUD operations stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useTodos.ts: Manages subject-scoped todos with migration from legacy formats and versioned localStorage storage.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers, defines light/dark theme CSS variables, global base styles, a horizontal scroll utility, and a slow-fill animation.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a cn helper that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, and loads global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/CalendarDashboard.tsx: Implements a calendar dashboard with month navigation and a per‑day work item list supporting add, edit, and delete.
frontend/src/pages/Customize.tsx: Provides a customization screen for UI settings, presets, preview modes, and subject management.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays study stats, timers, active chapters, and dashboard notes with subject and chapter integration.
frontend/src/pages/Notes.tsx: Implements a notes manager with creation, editing, selection, and deletion features.
frontend/src/pages/SubjectPage.tsx: Shows a subject’s chapters, todos, and resources with chapter timers and chapter creation support.
frontend/src/pages/Tests.tsx: React page for managing tests with CRUD for tests and scores plus charts and UI state handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata outlining app purpose, architecture, known issues, and existing features for build planning.
